Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Major
b) Defect Observed: Fire control computer error. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Weapon Release component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Update technical documentation with lessons learned
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent.
Date: 27/01/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer
